name: reloaderoo
description: Hot-reload your MCP servers without restarting your AI coding assistant. Works excellently with VSCode MCP, well with Claude Code. A transparent development proxy for the Model Context Protocol that enables seamless server restarts during development.
author: Cameron Cooke <web@cameroncooke.com>

scripts.test:unit: vitest run tests/config.test.ts tests/errors.test.ts tests/proxy.test.ts tests/process-manager.test.ts tests/restart-handler.test.ts
scripts.test:ci: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration && npm run test:cli
scripts.test:all: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration && npm run test:e2e
scripts.test:dev: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration
scripts.prepare-release: npm run build && npm run test:ci
scripts.inspector:test: npm run build && npm run inspector node 'dist/bin/reloaderoo.js -- node test-server-sdk.js'
scripts.inspector:inspect: npm run build && npm run inspector node 'dist/bin/reloaderoo.js inspect mcp -- node test-server-sdk.js'
